# searchFieldDidStartSearching(_:)

**Instance Method**

The method that is called when the search field begins searching for content.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor optional func searchFieldDidStartSearching(_ sender: NSSearchField)
```

## Detecting the Start and End of a Search

- **searchFieldDidEndSearching(_:)**: The method that is called when the search field has ended its search for content.
